Package com.github.upthewaterspout.fates.core.threading.harness

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AtomicControl
    Abstract interface for an object that can have some sort of atomic behavior.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicClassLoader
    A class loader that used the given AtomicControl during classloading operations to mark the class loading as atomic.
    ErrorCapturingExplorer
    A state explorer that captures errors and saves them for the done method.
    ExecutionEventListenerWithAtomicControl
    A decorator for a ExecutionEventListener that allows disabling the ExecutionEventListenerWithAtomicControl.beforeGetField(String, String, int) and ExecutionEventListenerWithAtomicControl.beforeSetField(String, String, int) calls inside of an atomic block.
    ThreadLocalEventListener
    A decorate for a ExecutionEventListener that is only enabled for the current thread and any thread spawned by the current thread.
